snippet: The head writer and vice president for creative at Rockstar Games speaks about what they are trying to achieve with Grand Theft Auto V, due out next spring.
abstract: Dan Houser, head writer and vice president for creative at Rockstar Games, speaks about what the company is trying to achieve with its upcoming video game, Grand Theft Auto V.
lead_paragraph: The head writer and vice president for creative at Rockstar Games speaks about what they are trying to achieve with Grand Theft Auto V, due out next spring.

headline.seo: Q. and A.: Rockstar’s Dan Houser on Grand Theft Auto V
headline.print_headline: A WORD WITH: DAN HOUSER: Americana at Its Most Felonious
